snippet: Alabama’s 42-14 win over Notre Dame in the B.C.S. national championship game Monday night was seen by an average of 26.4 million viewers, the second-biggest audience for a program in cable TV history.
lead_paragraph: Alabama’s 42-14 win over Notre Dame in the B.C.S. national championship game Monday night was seen by an average of 26.4 million viewers, the second-biggest audience for a program in cable TV history.

headline.seo: College Football Title Game Draws Second Biggest Cable Audience
headline.main: Title Game Draws Second Biggest Cable Audience
headline.print_headline: Title Game Draws Second Biggest Cable Audience
